airline.description: Tools available for airline customer service agents to help with flight reservations, modifications, and customer support.

tools.name: search_direct_flight
tools.description: Search for direct flights between two cities on a specific date.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-01-01'.

tools.returns: A list of DirectFlight objects containing flight details, schedules, and pricing.

tools.name: search_onestop_flight
tools.description: Search for one-stop flights between two cities on a specific date.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.

tools.returns: A list of pairs of DirectFlight objects representing connecting flights.

tools.name: list_all_airports
tools.description: Returns a list of all available airports with their IATA codes and city names.
tools.returns: A list of AirportCode objects with IATA codes and city names.

tools.name: book_reservation
tools.description: Book a flight reservation for one or more passengers.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to book the reservation such as 'sara_doe_496'.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The IATA code for the origin city such as 'SFO'.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The IATA code for the destination city such as 'JFK'.

parameters.name: flight_type
parameters.description: The type of flight such as 'one_way' or 'round_trip'.

parameters.name: cabin
parameters.description: The cabin class such as 'basic_economy', 'economy', or 'business'.

parameters.name: flights
parameters.description: An array of objects containing details about each piece of flight.

parameters.name: passengers
parameters.description: An array of objects containing details about each passenger.

parameters.name: payment_methods
parameters.description: An array of objects containing details about each payment method.

parameters.name: total_baggages
parameters.description: The total number of baggage items to book the reservation.

parameters.name: nonfree_baggages
parameters.description: The number of non-free baggage items to book the reservation.

parameters.name: insurance
parameters.description: Whether the reservation has insurance.

tools.returns: A Reservation object containing the booking details and confirmation.

tools.name: get_reservation_details
tools.description: Get the details of a reservation.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description: The reservation ID, such as '8JX2WO'.

tools.returns: The reservation details including flights, passengers, and payment information.

tools.name: get_user_details
tools.description: Get the details of a user, including their reservations.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID, such as 'sara_doe_496'.

tools.returns: The user details including profile and reservation history.

tools.name: cancel_reservation
tools.description: Cancel the whole reservation.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description: The reservation ID, such as 'ZFA04Y'.

tools.returns: The updated reservation with cancellation details and refund information.

tools.name: calculate
tools.description: Calculate the result of a mathematical expression.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The mathematical expression to calculate, such as '2 + 2'. The expression can contain numbers, operators (+, -, *, /), parentheses, and spaces.

tools.returns: The result of the mathematical expression as a string.

tools.name: send_certificate
tools.description: Send a certificate to a user. Be careful!

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to book the reservation, such as 'sara_doe_496'.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of the certificate to send.

tools.returns: A message indicating the certificate was sent.

tools.name: transfer_to_human_agents
tools.description: Transfer the user to a human agent when the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.
tools.returns: Confirmation that the transfer request has been initiated.

retail.description: Tools available for retail customer service agents to help with orders, returns, exchanges, and customer account management.

tools.name: authenticate_user
tools.description: Authenticate user identity by locating their user id via email, or via name + zip code.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The user's email address for authentication.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The user's full name when using name + zip authentication.

parameters.name: zip_code
parameters.description: The user's zip code when using name + zip authentication.

tools.returns: User authentication details and user ID.

tools.name: get_user_profile
tools.description: Get user profile information including addresses and payment methods.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The authenticated user's ID.

tools.returns: User profile containing user id, email, default address, and payment methods.

tools.name: get_user_orders
tools.description: Get all orders for a specific user.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The authenticated user's ID.

tools.returns: List of all orders with their status, items, and details.

tools.name: get_order_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific order.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique order ID.

tools.returns: Detailed order information including items, status, fulfillment, and payment history.

tools.name: search_products
tools.description: Search for products in the retail catalog.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for products.

tools.returns: List of products matching the search criteria with variants and pricing.

tools.name: get_product_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific product including all variants.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The unique product ID.

tools.returns: Product details including all variants, options, availability, and pricing.

tools.name: cancel_order
tools.description: Cancel a pending order. Can only be used if order status is 'pending'.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique order ID to cancel.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason for cancellation: 'no longer needed' or 'ordered by mistake'.

tools.returns: Updated order with cancellation details and refund information.

tools.name: modify_order
tools.description: Modify a pending order. Can only be used if order status is 'pending'. Can only be called once per order.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique order ID to modify.

parameters.name: modifications
parameters.description: List of modifications to make to the order items.

tools.returns: Updated order with modification details and any price changes.

tools.name: return_order
tools.description: Return items from a delivered order.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique order ID for the return.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: List of items to return with quantities.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason for the return.

tools.returns: Return confirmation with refund details and return shipping information.

tools.name: exchange_order
tools.description: Exchange items from a delivered order. Can only be called once per order.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique order ID for the exchange.

parameters.name: exchanges
parameters.description: List of items to exchange with new item details.

tools.returns: Exchange confirmation with price differences and shipping information.

tools.name: update_user_address
tools.description: Modify the user's default address.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The authenticated user's ID.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The new address information.

tools.returns: Confirmation of the address update.

tools.name: transfer_to_human_agents
tools.description: Transfer the user to a human agent when the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.
tools.returns: Confirmation that the transfer request has been initiated.

telecom.description: Tools available for telecom customer service agents to help with technical support, billing, line management, and plan options.

tools.name: get_customer_profile
tools.description: Get customer profile information including account details and associated lines.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The customer ID to look up.

tools.returns: Customer profile with personal information, account status, and associated line IDs.

tools.name: search_customer
tools.description: Search for customer by phone number, email, or name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query - can be phone number, email, or customer name.

tools.returns: Customer information matching the search criteria.

tools.name: get_line_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific line including status, plan, and usage.

parameters.name: line_id
parameters.description: The line ID to look up.

tools.returns: Line details including status, plan, device, data usage, and contract information.

tools.name: get_device_details
tools.description: Get information about a device including model, IMEI, and activation status.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The device ID to look up.

tools.returns: Device information including type, model, IMEI, eSIM capability, and activation details.

tools.name: get_bill_details
tools.description: Get billing information for a customer.

parameters.name: bill_id
parameters.description: The bill ID to look up.

tools.returns: Bill details including billing period, amount, due date, and payment status.

tools.name: get_available_plans
tools.description: Get list of available service plans with pricing and features.
tools.returns: List of available plans with data limits, pricing, and features.

tools.name: check_service_status
tools.description: Check the current service status for a line including network connectivity.

parameters.name: line_id
parameters.description: The line ID to check service status for.

tools.returns: Service status information including network connectivity and any issues.

tools.name: restart_network_service
tools.description: Restart network service for a line to resolve connectivity issues.

parameters.name: line_id
parameters.description: The line ID to restart service for.

tools.returns: Confirmation of service restart and expected resolution time.

tools.name: toggle_airplane_mode
tools.description: Toggle airplane mode on a device to help resolve connectivity issues.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The device ID to toggle airplane mode for.

tools.returns: Confirmation of airplane mode toggle action.

tools.name: reset_network_settings
tools.description: Reset network settings on a device to resolve configuration issues.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The device ID to reset network settings for.

tools.returns: Confirmation of network settings reset.

tools.name: suspend_line
tools.description: Suspend service for a line.

parameters.name: line_id
parameters.description: The line ID to suspend.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason for suspension.

tools.returns: Confirmation of line suspension with effective date.

tools.name: reactivate_line
tools.description: Reactivate a suspended line.

parameters.name: line_id
parameters.description: The line ID to reactivate.

tools.returns: Confirmation of line reactivation.

tools.name: change_plan
tools.description: Change the service plan for a line.

parameters.name: line_id
parameters.description: The line ID to change the plan for.

parameters.name: new_plan_id
parameters.description: The new plan ID to switch to.

tools.returns: Confirmation of plan change with effective date and pricing details.

tools.name: process_payment
tools.description: Process payment for overdue bills.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The customer ID to process payment for.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The payment amount.

parameters.name: payment_method_id
parameters.description: The payment method to use.

tools.returns: Payment confirmation with transaction details.

tools.name: setup_payment_extension
tools.description: Set up a payment extension for a customer with overdue bills.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The customer ID to set up extension for.

parameters.name: extension_days
parameters.description: Number of days to extend payment deadline.

tools.returns: Confirmation of payment extension with new due date.

tools.name: add_data_refill
tools.description: Add data refill to a line that has exceeded its plan limit.

parameters.name: line_id
parameters.description: The line ID to add data refill for.

parameters.name: data_amount_gb
parameters.description: Amount of data to add in GB.

tools.returns: Confirmation of data refill with cost and new data balance.

tools.name: transfer_to_human_agents
tools.description: Transfer the user to a human agent when the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.
tools.returns: Confirmation that the transfer request has been initiated.

mock.description: Tools available for the mock testing domain to demonstrate basic task management functionality.

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task for a user.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to create the task for, such as 'user_1'.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the task to create.

tools.returns: Confirmation that the task was created successfully with task details.

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Get details of a specific task.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to retrieve.

tools.returns: Task details including title, status, and user information.

tools.name: list_user_tasks
tools.description: List all tasks for a specific user.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to list tasks for.

tools.returns: List of all tasks belonging to the specified user.

tools.name: update_task_status
tools.description: Update the status of a task. Status can only be 'pending' or 'completed'.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to update.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The new status: 'pending' or 'completed'.

tools.returns: Confirmation of status update with updated task details.

tools.name: compliment_user
tools.description: Give a compliment to the user when requested.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to compliment.

tools.returns: A friendly compliment message for the user.
